events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at the intersection on April 29th.
Based on the report details, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident for processing by the correct department.
An experienced agent was assigned to the case to ensure fast communication and proper support.
The insurance company officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer of next steps.
Requested the customer to submit the police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the accident damage.
Customer promptly submitted all required documents including the police report and repair estimates.
Investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and contacted the other party's insurer.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the other driver was at fault in the accident.
A settlement amount covering the repair costs and rental car expenses was proposed to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciated the quick handling of their case.
The claim was formally approved after the customer accepted the settlement proposal without objections.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount was transferred to the customer’s bank account.
The claim case was officially closed following payment and confirmation that the customer’s vehicle was repaired.
All records and documentation were archived for this auto accident claim in compliance with company policy.
